general-ads.name: Block General Ads
general-ads.desc: Block all general advertisements in the interface.

sponsorblock.name: SponsorBlock
sponsorblock.desc: Integrate SponsorBlock. Blocks all sponsored and self promotions in videos.

return-youtube-dislike.name: Show Dislike Count
return-youtube-dislike.desc: Shows dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

downloads.name: Downloads
downloads.desc: Download music and videos (Requires Setup)

hide-shorts-button.name: Hide Shorts Button
hide-shorts-button.desc: Hides the Shorts button on the navigation bar.

hide-cast-button.name: Hide Cast Button
hide-cast-button.desc: Hides the Cast button in the video player.

hide-create-button.name: Hide Create Button
hide-create-button.desc: Hides the Create button in the navigation bar.

hide-autoplay-button.name: Hide Autoplay Button
hide-autoplay-button.desc: Hides the Autoplay button in the video player.

hide-my-mix.name: Hide "My Mix" Playlists
hide-my-mix.desc: Hides the My Mix playlist suggestions.

hide-artist-card.name: Hide Artist Card
hide-artist-card.desc: Hides the artist card below the searchbar.

hide-album-cards.name: Hide Album Cards
hide-album-cards.desc: Hides the album cards below the artist description.

hide-captions-button.name: Hide Captions Button
hide-captions-button.desc: Hides the Captions button in the video player.

hide-crowdfunding-box.name: Hide Crowdfunding Box
hide-crowdfunding-box.desc: Hides the crowdfunding box between the player and video description.

hide-endscreen-cards.name: Hide Endscreen Cards
hide-endscreen-cards.desc: Hides the suggested video cards at the end of a video in fullscreen.

hide-watch-in-vr.name: Hide "Watch in VR"
hide-watch-in-vr.desc: Hides the Watch in VR option from the player settings flyout panel.

disable-fullscreen-panels.name: Disable Fullscreen Panels
disable-fullscreen-panels.desc: Disables video description and comments panel in fullscreen view.

enable-wide-searchbar.name: Enable Wide Search Bar
enable-wide-searchbar.desc: Replaces the search icon with a search bar. Hide the YouTube logo when active.

hide-video-buttons.name: Hide Video Buttons
hide-video-buttons.desc: Add options to hide action buttons under a video.

premium-heading.name: Premium Heading
premium-heading.desc: Shows premium branding on the home screen.

hide-time-and-seekbar.name: Hide Time and Seekbar
hide-time-and-seekbar.desc: Hides progress bar and time counter on videos.

disable-auto-player-popup-panels.name: Disable Auto Popup Panels
disable-auto-player-popup-panels.desc: Disable automatic popups (playlist or live chat) on videos.

remove-player-button-background.name: Remove Player Button Background
remove-player-button-background.desc: Removes the background from the video player buttons.

swipe-controls.name: Swipe Controls
swipe-controls.desc: Adds volume and brightness swipe controls when video is fullscreen.

seekbar-tapping.name: Seekbar Tapping
seekbar-tapping.desc: Enables tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

old-quality-layout.name: Old Quality Menu
old-quality-layout.desc: Enables the original quality flyout menu.

remember-video-quality.name: Remember Video Quality
remember-video-quality.desc: Remember the video quality you chose in the video quality flyout.

custom-playback-speed.name: Custom Playback Speed
custom-playback-speed.desc: Adds more video playback speed options.

tablet-mini-player.name: Tablet Mini Player
tablet-mini-player.desc: Enables the tablet mini player layout.

disable-auto-captions.name: Disable Auto Captions
disable-auto-captions.desc: Disable forced captions from being auto enabled.

open-links-directly.name: Open Links Directly
open-links-directly.desc: Bypasses redirect links and allows opening links directly.

disable-startup-shorts-player.name: Disable Shorts on Startup
disable-startup-shorts-player.desc: Disables playing YouTube Shorts when launching YouTube.

custom-video-buffer.name: Custom Video Buffer
custom-video-buffer.desc: Lets you change the buffers of videos.

always-autorepeat.name: Always Auto-Repeat
always-autorepeat.desc: Always repeats the playing video again.

hdr-auto-brightness.name: HDR Auto Brightness
hdr-auto-brightness.desc: Makes the brightness of HDR videos follow the system default.

hide-email-address.name: Hide E-Mail Address
hide-email-address.desc: Hide email address in the account switcher.

debugging.name: Enable Debugging (Slows Down App)
debugging.desc: Enables app debugging by patching the manifest file.

music-video-ads.name: Block Ads
music-video-ads.desc: Removes ads in the music player.

background-play.name: Background Playback
background-play.desc: Enables playing music in the background and while screen off.

exclusive-audio-playback.name: Exclusive Audio Playback
exclusive-audio-playback.desc: Enables the option to play music without video.

hide-get-premium.name: Hide "Get Premium"
hide-get-premium.desc: Removes all "Get Premium" evidences from the avatar menu.

tasteBuilder-remover.name: Remove Taste Builder
tasteBuilder-remover.desc: Removes the "Tell us which artists you like" card from the home screen.

minimized-playback-music.name: Minimized Playback (Kids)
minimized-playback-music.desc: Enables minimized playback on Kids music.

compact-header.name: Compact Header
compact-header.desc: Hides the music category bar at the top of the homepage.

codecs-unlock.name: More Audio Codecs
codecs-unlock.desc: More audio codec options. The new codecs usually result in better audio quality.

general-reddit-ads.name: Block Ads and Promotions (Required)
general-reddit-ads.desc: Removes Ads from the Reddit frontpage and subreddits.

premium-icon-reddit.name: Premium Branding
premium-icon-reddit.desc: Unlocks premium icons in app settings.

hide-premium-navbar.name: Hide Premium Navbar
hide-premium-navbar.desc: Removes the Premium tab from the navbar.

disable-capture-restriction.name: Disable Capture Restriction
disable-capture-restriction.desc: Allows capturing Spotify's audio output while screen sharing or screen recording.

tiktok-ads.name: Block Ads (Required)
tiktok-ads.desc: Removes Ads from the entire TikTok app.

tiktok-seekbar.name: Seekbar
tiktok-seekbar.desc: Show progress bar for all videos.

tiktok-speed.name: Playback Speed
tiktok-speed.desc: Enables the playback speed option for all videos.

tiktok-web-login.name: Web Login
tiktok-web-login.desc: Allows logging in from a Google account.

sim-spoof.name: SIM Spoof
sim-spoof.desc: Spoofs the information which is retrieved from the sim-card.

block-audio-ads.name: Block Audio Ads
block-audio-ads.desc: Removes audio ads in streams and VODs.

block-video-ads.name: Block Video Ads
block-video-ads.desc: Removes video ads in streams and VODs.

show-deleted-messages.name: Show Deleted Messages
show-deleted-messages.desc: Shows deleted chat messages behind a clickable spoiler.

timeline-ads.name: Block Ads and Promotions (Required)
timeline-ads.desc: Removes ads from the Twitter timeline.

dynamic-color.name: Dynamic Color
dynamic-color.desc: Replace the default Twitter Blue with your Android/Material You palette.

promo-code-unlock.name: Promo Code Unlock (Required)
promo-code-unlock.desc: Disables the validation of promo code. Any code will unlock all features.
